mapper.insert: insert into alarm_content(alarm_content_num, alarm_content_name, alarm_content_text, alarm_content_url) value(#{alarmContentNum}, #{alarmContentName}, #{alarmContentText}, #{alarmContentUrl})
insert into alarm_system(member_num, alarm_content_num, alarm_type) value(#{memberNum}, #{alarmContentNum}, #{alarmType})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, ac.* FROM alarm_system a JOIN alarm_content ac ON a.alarm_content_num = ac.alarm_content_num WHERE a.member_num = #{memberNum} and alarm_check = 'N' ORDER BY a.alarm_reg_at DESC LIMIT 10
select member_num from member where member_id = #{mebmerId}
mapper.update: update alarm_system set alarm_check = 'Y' where member_num = #{memberNum} and alarm_reg_at = #{alarmRegAt}
mapper.select: SELECT alarm_system.*, alarm_content.* FROM alarm_system JOIN alarm_content ON alarm_system.alarm_content_num = alarm_content.alarm_content_num WHERE alarm_system.member_num = #{memberNum};
mapper.delete: delete from alarm_system where member_num = #{memberNum} and alarm_reg_at = #{alarmRegAt}
